title: Exploring Energy Concepts: Scientific Modeling and Inquiry-Based Learning (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of fundamental physics concepts (forms of energy, conversions, etc.)
context.additional_context: A social studies-linked program for vocational training institutions, connecting energy concepts to social problem-solving.

learning_goals: Students can create virtual models of energy flow and visually explain the energy conversion process.
Students can write a report analyzing the dynamic characteristics of energy systems by applying scientific inquiry methods.
Students can enhance their understanding of energy concepts by over 80% through a collaborative model revision process.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
